idea:
To carry on the business as weavers or otherwise manufacturers, buyers, sellers, importers, exporters and dealers of silk, art silk, synthetic, woolen and cotton fabrics and other fibrous products including furnishing materials, mattress, carpets and carpet backing, blankets padding knitted goods and to carry on the business of packing, grading, crimping, twisting, texturing, bleaching dyeing, printing, mercerizing or otherwise processing yarn, cloth, mattress, carpets, blankets and other textile goods, whether made from cotton, jute, wool, silk, art silk, synthetic and other fibers or blends thereof.

To carry on the business as interior designers, interior decorators, designers of furniture, manufacturing and trading of furniture, office furniture, office equipment and act as consultants and undertake contract and provide labour for furnishing, decorating, painting, planning, clearing, polishing, maintaining and designing artificial wood, plywood, fibers and materials required for false ceiling and other house hold articles required for decorating shops, houses, bungalows, buildings, private and public office, government department, stores, cinema houses, factories.
name: DISHAAN SPACES PRIVATE LIMITED
